long_description: Windproof and very lightweight, the men's Westcomb Nomad Jacket pulls double duty. It's stylish enough to wear around town, yet technical enough to handle all your high-octane adventures. Velvetlike interior of the soft, windproof and highly breathable Pertex(R) Equilibrium(R) fabric draws sweat away from your body to keep you cool and dry. Collar is lined with velour for next-to-skin comfort. Westcomb Nomad Jacket features zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket. 2-way center-front zipper lets you vent from the bottom. Low-profile cuff tabs adjust to seal wind out. Features a tailored fit and weighs only 5.6 ounces.
short_description: Windproof and very lightweight, the men's Westcomb Nomad Jacket pulls double duty. It's stylish enough to wear around town, yet technical enough to handle all your high-octane adventures.
